head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KAUPP, FRANKLIN O.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KAUPP, FRANKLIN O.

block.p: KAUPP-Franklin O. On September 18, 2000. Husband of Evelyn Gross. Father of Ruth (Mark) Hroncick and Evelyn C. Grandfather of Sarah and Benjamin Hroncick. Visiting Tuesday & Wednesday 2-5 & 7-9:30 PM at the Thomas F. Dalton Funeral Home, 29 Atlantic Avenue, Floral Park, N.Y. (at RR Plaza). Mass of Christian burial on Thursday 10:30 A.M., at Our Lady of Victory R.C. Church. Interment Holy Rood Cemetery.
